name: Leap Blocks
description:
(Leap Motion 3DJam entry)

Puzzle Game where you can grab and launch blocks with gestures. And make things go BOOM.

You have to destroy the topmost cubes hitting them with whatever you can grab. Or explode.

What's done:

  • Unreal Engine 4 integration of Leap Motion
  • Basic game mechanics
  • 20 levels
  • Cel-Shading

Next to do:

  • Level design (20 levels?)
  • Polish and pizzazz

Future work

  • More levels and types of blocks
  • Hand model rig
  • VR integration
  • Level selection screen
  • Top Score per level
